features: Soft and breathable recycled polyester/spandex jersey blend stays comfortable all day long
Engineered support straps move with you, providing unencumbered movement across shoulders and back
Low, contoured armholes provide coverage without limiting movement
Built-in shelf bra uses quick-drying, supportive elastic across the front to provide support with all-day comfort and mobility
High-density cups hold their shape after extended use and washing

Body: 5.4-oz 89% recycled polyester/11% spandex jersey. Shelf bra: 4.7-oz 73% nylon/27% spandex power mesh and 4-oz 100% polyester (70% recycled) jersey with an antimicrobial finish. Cups: 100% polyester. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
